last_episode_to_air.name: Ijou Chitai: Jikken Dorei
last_episode_to_air.overview: After the death of his parents, Konno Azusa inherited his parents' parents. However, over time the occupants of the boarding house were accepted one by one, and Azusa as the owner of the boarding house was willing to do anything to make one of the last occupants stay in the boarding house, it must still need it.
